verses.verse: וַיִּבְרַ֣ח <WH1272> fled דָּוִ֔ד <WH1732> And David [מִנֹּוִות כ] (מִנָּיֹ֖ות <WH5121> Naioth ק) בָּרָמָ֑ה <WH7414> in Ramah וַיָּבֹ֞א <WH935> and came וַיֹּ֣אמֶר ׀ <WH559> and said לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יְהוֹנָתָ֗ן <WH3083> Jonathan מֶ֤ה <WH4100> What עָשִׂ֙יתִי֙ <WH6213> What have I done מֶֽה־ <WH4100> What עֲוֹנִ֤י <WH5771> fault וּמֶֽה־ <WH4100> What חַטָּאתִי֙ <WH2403> is my sin לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before אָבִ֔יךָ <WH1> thy father כִּ֥י <WH3588> for מְבַקֵּ֖שׁ <WH1245> that he seeketh אֶת־ <WH853> נַפְשִֽׁי׃ <WH5315> He

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> And he said ל֣וֹ חָלִילָה֮ <WH2486> unto him God forbid לֹ֣א <WH3808> without תָמוּת֒ <WH4191> thou shalt not die הִנֵּ֡ה <WH2009> Behold [לֹו־ עשה כ] (לֹֽא־ יַעֲשֶׂ֨ה <WH6213> accomplish ק) אָבִ֜י <WH1> behold my father דָּבָ֣ר <WH1697> nothing גָּד֗וֹל <WH1419> either great א֚וֹ <WH176> or דָּבָ֣ר <WH1697> this thing קָטֹ֔ן <WH6996> or small וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> without יִגְלֶ֖ה <WH1540> disclosing אֶת־ <WH853> אָזְנִ֑י <WH241> So וּמַדּוּעַ֩ <WH4069> why יַסְתִּ֨יר <WH5641> hide אָבִ֥י <WH1> it me and why should my father מִמֶּ֛נִּי <WH4480> at אֶת־ <WH853> הַדָּבָ֥ר <WH1697> thing הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> this אֵ֥ין <WH369> else זֹֽאת׃ <WH2063> likewise

וַיִּשָּׁבַ֨ע <WH7650> sware ע֜וֹד <WH5750> again דָּוִ֗ד <WH1732> And David וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> moreover and said יָדֹ֨עַ <WH3045> certainly יָדַ֜ע <WH3045> knoweth אָבִ֗יךָ <WH1> Thy father כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for מָצָ֤אתִי <WH4672> that I have found חֵן֙ <WH2580> grace בְּעֵינֶ֔יךָ <WH5869> in thine eyes וַיֹּ֛אמֶר <WH559> and he saith אַל־ <WH408> nay יֵֽדַע־ <WH3045> know זֹ֥את <WH2063> let יְהוֹנָתָ֖ן <WH3083> Let not Jonathan פֶּן־ <WH6435> or יֵֽעָצֵ֑ב <WH6087> this lest he be grieved וְאוּלָ֗ם <WH199> but truly חַי־ <WH2416> liveth יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> [as] the LORD וְחֵ֣י <WH2416> liveth נַפְשֶׁ֔ךָ <WH5315> and [as] thy soul כִּ֣י <WH3588> is hardly כְפֶ֔שַׂע <WH6587> [there is] but a step בֵּינִ֖י <WH996> between וּבֵ֥ין <WH996> between הַמָּֽוֶת׃ <WH4194> between me and death

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> Then said יְהוֹנָתָ֖ן <WH3083> Jonathan אֶל־ <WH413> to דָּוִ֑ד <WH1732> unto David מַה־ <WH4100> Whatever תֹּאמַ֥ר <WH559> desireth נַפְשְׁךָ֖ <WH5315> Whatsoever thy soul וְאֶֽעֱשֶׂה־ <WH6213> I will even do לָּֽךְ׃ פ

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said דָּוִ֜ד <WH1732> And David אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוֹנָתָ֗ן <WH3083> unto Jonathan הִֽנֵּה־ <WH2009> Behold חֹ֙דֶשׁ֙ <WH2320> [is] the new moon מָחָ֔ר <WH4279> Behold to morrow וְאָנֹכִ֛י <WH595> and I יָשֹׁב־ <WH3427> and I should not fail אֵשֵׁ֥ב <WH3427> to sit עִם־ <WH5973> with הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> with the king לֶאֱכ֑וֹל <WH398> at meat וְשִׁלַּחְתַּ֙נִי֙ <WH7971> but let me go וְנִסְתַּרְתִּ֣י <WH5641> that I may hide בַשָּׂדֶ֔ה <WH7704> myself in the field עַ֖ד <WH5704> until הָעֶ֥רֶב <WH6153> [day] at even הַשְּׁלִשִֽׁית׃ <WH7992> unto the third

אִם־ <WH518> If פָּקֹ֥ד <WH6485> at all יִפְקְדֵ֖נִי <WH6485> miss אָבִ֑יךָ <WH1> If thy father וְאָמַרְתָּ֗ <WH559> me then say נִשְׁאֹל֩ <WH7592> earnestly נִשְׁאַ֨ל <WH7592> asked מִמֶּ֤נִּי <WH4480> at דָוִד֙ <WH1732> David לָרוּץ֙ <WH7323> [leave] of me that he might run בֵּֽית־ לֶ֣חֶם <WH1035> to Bethlehem עִיר֔וֹ <WH5892> his city כִּ֣י <WH3588> because זֶ֧בַח <WH2077> sacrifice הַיָּמִ֛ים <WH3117> for [there is] a yearly שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> there לְכָל־ <WH3605> the whole הַמִּשְׁפָּחָֽה׃ <WH4940> there for all the family

אִם־ <WH518> If כֹּ֥ה <WH3541> he יֹאמַ֛ר <WH559> If he say ט֖וֹב <WH2896> thus [It is] well שָׁל֣וֹם <WH7965> shall have peace לְעַבְדֶּ֑ךָ <WH5650> thy servant וְאִם־ <WH518> if חָרֹ֤ה <WH2734> but if he be very יֶֽחֱרֶה֙ <WH2734> wroth ל֔וֹ דַּ֕ע <WH3045> [then] be sure כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for כָלְתָ֥ה <WH3615> is determined הָרָעָ֖ה <WH7451> that evil מֵעִמּֽוֹ׃ <WH5973> Therefore

וְעָשִׂ֤יתָ <WH6213> Therefore thou shalt deal חֶ֙סֶד֙ <WH2617> kindly עַל־ <WH5921> with עַבְדֶּ֔ךָ <WH5650> with thy servant כִּ֚י <WH3588> into בִּבְרִ֣ית <WH1285> into a covenant יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD הֵבֵ֥אתָ <WH935> for thou hast brought אֶֽת־ <WH853> עַבְדְּךָ֖ <WH5650> thy servant עִמָּ֑ךְ <WH5973> But וְאִם־ <WH518> if יֶשׁ־ <WH3426> with thee notwithstanding if there be בִּ֤י עָוֹן֙ <WH5771> in me iniquity הֲמִיתֵ֣נִי <WH4191> slay אַ֔תָּה <WH859> yourself וְעַד־ <WH5704> against אָבִ֖יךָ <WH1> fathers לָמָּה־ <WH4100> why זֶּ֥ה <WH2088> then תְבִיאֵֽנִי׃ <WH935> me thyself for why shouldest thou bring פ

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוֹנָתָ֖ן <WH3083> And Jonathan חָלִ֣ילָה <WH2486> Far be it from thee לָּ֑ךְ כִּ֣י ׀ <WH3588> For אִם־ <WH518> if יָדֹ֣עַ <WH3045> for if I knew אֵדַ֗ע <WH3045> certainly כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for כָלְתָ֨ה <WH3615> were determined הָרָעָ֜ה <WH7451> that evil מֵעִ֤ם <WH5973> by אָבִי֙ <WH1> by my father לָב֣וֹא <WH935> to come עָלֶ֔יךָ <WH5921> and וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> not אֹתָ֖הּ <WH853> אַגִּ֥יד <WH5046> upon thee then would not I tell לָֽךְ׃ ס

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> Then said דָּוִד֙ <WH1732> David אֶל־ <WH413> to יְה֣וֹנָתָ֔ן <WH3083> to Jonathan מִ֖י <WH4310> Who יַגִּ֣יד <WH5046> Who shall tell לִ֑י א֛וֹ <WH176> and מַה־ <WH4100> how long יַּעַנְךָ֥ <WH6030> answer אָבִ֖יךָ <WH1> me? or what [if] thy father קָשָֽׁה׃ <WH7186> churlish ס

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said יְהֽוֹנָתָן֙ <WH3083> And Jonathan אֶל־ <WH413> to דָּוִ֔ד <WH1732> unto David לְכָ֖ה <WH1980> Come וְנֵצֵ֣א <WH3318> and let us go out הַשָּׂדֶ֑ה <WH7704> into the field וַיֵּצְא֥וּ <WH3318> And they went out שְׁנֵיהֶ֖ם <WH8147> both הַשָּׂדֶֽה׃ <WH7704> of them into the field ס

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוֹנָתָ֜ן <WH3083> And Jonathan אֶל־ <WH413> toward דָּוִ֗ד <WH1732> unto David יְהוָ֞ה <WH3068> O LORD אֱלֹהֵ֤י <WH430> God יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel כִּֽי־ <WH3588> When אֶחְקֹ֣ר <WH2713> when I have sounded אֶת־ <WH853> אָבִ֗י <WH1> my father כָּעֵ֤ת ׀ <WH6256> any time מָחָר֙ <WH4279> about to morrow הַשְּׁלִשִׁ֔ית <WH7992> [or] the third וְהִנֵּה־ <WH2009> behold ט֖וֹב <WH2896> good אֶל־ <WH413> toward דָּוִ֑ד <WH1732> toward David וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> not אָז֙ <WH227> then אֶשְׁלַ֣ח <WH7971> and I then send אֵלֶ֔יךָ <WH413> toward וְגָלִ֖יתִי <WH1540> and make אֶת־ <WH853> אָזְנֶֽךָ׃ <WH241> hearing

כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> so יַעֲשֶׂה֩ <WH6213> do יְהוָ֨ה <WH3068> The LORD לִֽיהוֹנָתָ֜ן <WH3083> to Jonathan וְכֹ֣ה <WH3541> so יֹסִ֗יף <WH3254> and much more כִּֽי־ <WH3588> If יֵיטִ֨ב <WH3190> but if it please אֶל־ <WH413> about אָבִ֤י <WH1> my father אֶת־ <WH853> הָֽרָעָה֙ <WH7451> [to do] thee evil עָלֶ֔יךָ <WH5921> and וְגָלִ֙יתִי֙ <WH1540> make אֶת־ <WH853> אָזְנֶ֔ךָ <WH241> to you וְשִׁלַּחְתִּ֖יךָ <WH7971> it thee and send thee away וְהָלַכְתָּ֣ <WH1980> that thou mayest go לְשָׁל֑וֹם <WH7965> in peace וִיהִ֤י <WH1961> has been יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> and the LORD עִמָּ֔ךְ <WH5973> as כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> he הָיָ֖ה <WH1961> been עִם־ <WH5973> with אָבִֽי׃ <WH1> be with thee as he hath been with my father

וְלֹ֖א <WH3808> not אִם־ <WH518> And thou shalt not only while yet עוֹדֶ֣נִּי <WH5750> I am still חָ֑י <WH2416> I live וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> not תַעֲשֶׂ֧ה <WH6213> shew עִמָּדִ֛י <WH5978> me חֶ֥סֶד <WH2617> me the kindness יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> not אָמֽוּת׃ <WH4191> that I die

וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> shall not תַכְרִ֧ת <WH3772> But [also] thou shalt not cut off אֶֽת־ <WH853> חַסְדְּךָ֛ <WH2617> thy kindness מֵעִ֥ם <WH5973> from בֵּיתִ֖י <WH1004> from my house עַד־ <WH5704> for עוֹלָ֑ם <WH5769> ever וְלֹ֗א <WH3808> not בְּהַכְרִ֤ת <WH3772> hath cut off יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> no not when the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> אֹיְבֵ֣י <WH341> the enemies דָוִ֔ד <WH1732> of David אִ֕ישׁ <WH376> every one מֵעַ֖ל <WH5921> from פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> from the face הָאֲדָמָֽה׃ <WH127> of the earth

וַיִּכְרֹ֥ת <WH3772> made יְהוֹנָתָ֖ן <WH3083> So Jonathan עִם־ <WH5973> A with בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> [a covenant] with the house דָּוִ֑ד <WH1732> of David וּבִקֵּ֣שׁ <WH1245> even require יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> [saying] Let the LORD מִיַּ֖ד <WH3027> [it] at the hand אֹיְבֵ֥י <WH341> enemies דָוִֽד׃ <WH1732> of David's

וַיּ֤וֹסֶף <WH3254> again יְהֽוֹנָתָן֙ <WH3083> And Jonathan לְהַשְׁבִּ֣יעַ <WH7650> to swear אֶת־ <WH853> דָּוִ֔ד <WH1732> caused David בְּאַהֲבָת֖וֹ <WH160> because he loved אֹת֑וֹ <WH853> כִּֽי־ <WH3588> because אַהֲבַ֥ת <WH160> him as he loved נַפְשׁ֖וֹ <WH5315> his own soul אֲהֵבֽוֹ׃ <WH157> him for he loved ס

וַיֹּֽאמֶר־ <WH559> said ל֥וֹ יְהוֹנָתָ֖ן <WH3083> Then Jonathan מָחָ֣ר <WH4279> To morrow חֹ֑דֶשׁ <WH2320> [is] the new moon וְנִפְקַ֕דְתָּ <WH6485> and thou shalt be missed כִּ֥י <WH3588> because יִפָּקֵ֖ד <WH6485> will be empty מוֹשָׁבֶֽךָ׃ <WH4186> because thy seat

וְשִׁלַּשְׁתָּ֙ <WH8027> And [when] thou hast stayed three days תֵּרֵ֣ד <WH3381> [then] thou shalt go down מְאֹ֔ד <WH3966> quickly וּבָאתָ֙ <WH935> and come אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמָּק֔וֹם <WH4725> to the place אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> you נִסְתַּ֥רְתָּ <WH5641> where thou didst hide שָּׁ֖ם <WH8033> in it בְּי֣וֹם <WH3117> thyself when הַֽמַּעֲשֶׂ֑ה <WH4639> the business וְיָ֣שַׁבְתָּ֔ <WH3427> was [in hand] and shalt remain אֵ֖צֶל <WH681> by הָאֶ֥בֶן <WH68> the stone הָאָֽזֶל׃ <WH237> Ezel

וַאֲנִ֕י <WH589> I שְׁלֹ֥שֶׁת <WH7969> three הַחִצִּ֖ים <WH2678> arrow צִדָּ֣ה <WH6654> on the side אוֹרֶ֑ה <WH3384> And I will shoot לְשַֽׁלַּֽח־ <WH7971> [thereof] as though I shot לִ֖י לְמַטָּרָֽה׃ <WH4307> at a mark

וְהִנֵּה֙ <WH2009> and behold אֶשְׁלַ֣ח <WH7971> And behold I will send אֶת־ <WH853> הַנַּ֔עַר <WH5288> a lad לֵ֖ךְ <WH1980> Go מְצָ֣א <WH4672> find out אֶת־ <WH853> הַחִצִּ֑ים <WH2678> arrow אִם־ <WH518> lo אָמֹר֩ <WH559> If I expressly אֹמַ֨ר <WH559> say לַנַּ֜עַר <WH5288> unto the lad הִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> Behold הַחִצִּ֣ים ׀ <WH2678> arrow מִמְּךָ֣ <WH4480> are on וָהֵ֗נָּה <WH2008> this קָחֶ֧נּוּ ׀ <WH3947> [are] on this side of thee take וָבֹ֛אָה <WH935> them then come כִּֽי־ <WH3588> there שָׁל֥וֹם <WH7965> thou for [there is] peace לְךָ֛ וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> and no דָּבָ֖ר <WH1697> to thee and no hurt חַי־ <WH2416> liveth יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> [as] the LORD

וְאִם־ <WH518> if כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> I אֹמַר֙ <WH559> But if I say לָעֶ֔לֶם <WH5958> thus unto the young man הִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> Behold הַחִצִּ֖ים <WH2678> arrow מִמְּךָ֣ <WH4480> at וָהָ֑לְאָה <WH1973> [are] beyond לֵ֕ךְ <WH1980> go כִּ֥י <WH3588> for שִֽׁלַּחֲךָ֖ <WH7971> hath sent thee away יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> for the LORD

וְהַ֨דָּבָ֔ר <WH1697> And [as touching] the matter אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> of which דִּבַּ֖רְנוּ <WH1696> which thou and I have spoken אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I וָאָ֑תָּה <WH859> you הִנֵּ֧ה <WH2009> behold יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> of behold the LORD בֵּינִ֥י <WH996> is between וּבֵינְךָ֖ <WH996> is between עַד־ <WH5704> [be] between thee and me for עוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> ever ס

וַיִּסָּתֵ֥ר <WH5641> hid דָּוִ֖ד <WH1732> So David בַּשָּׂדֶ֑ה <WH7704> himself in the field וַיְהִ֣י <WH1961> came הַחֹ֔דֶשׁ <WH2320> and when the new moon וַיֵּ֧שֶׁב <WH3427> sat him down הַמֶּ֛לֶךְ <WH4428> was come the king [עַל־ כ] (אֶל־ <WH5921> and הַלֶּ֖חֶם <WH413> about ק) לֶאֱכֽוֹל׃ <WH398> to eat

וַיֵּ֣שֶׁב <WH3427> sat הַ֠מֶּלֶךְ <WH4428> And the king עַל־ <WH5921> on מ֨וֹשָׁב֜וֹ <WH4186> upon his seat כְּפַ֣עַם ׀ <WH6471> as at other times בְּפַ֗עַם <WH6471> usual אֶל־ <WH413> about מוֹשַׁב֙ <WH4186> [even] upon a seat הַקִּ֔יר <WH7023> by the wall וַיָּ֙קָם֙ <WH6965> arose יְה֣וֹנָתָ֔ן <WH3083> and Jonathan וַיֵּ֥שֶׁב <WH3427> sat אַבְנֵ֖ר <WH74> and Abner מִצַּ֣ד <WH6654> side שָׁא֑וּל <WH7586> by Saul's וַיִּפָּקֵ֖ד <WH6485> was empty מְק֥וֹם <WH4725> place דָּוִֽד׃ <WH1732> and David's
